what: Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
title: Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
text: Takes animal sound string, creates message stating animal says sound, using paste0 function. sound NULL, sentence states animal makes sound.

title: Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
text: animal character string sound character string. input given defaults NULL.

title: Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
Describes the Given Sound and Animal as a Message — animal_sounds
code: animal_sounds("cow", "moo") #> [1] "The cow says moo!" animal_sounds("sheep", "baa") #> [1] "The sheep says baa!" animal_sounds("fish") #> [1] "The fish makes no sound."

what: Farm animals and the sounds they make — farm_animals

title: Farm animals and the sounds they make — farm_animals
Farm animals and the sounds they make — farm_animals
